explains: n. 全球化；传播，流传，趋同化
wordGroup: economic globalization 经济全球化，全球化

sentences.en: Globalization is a phenomenon of the 21st century.
Globalization is a catchall to describe increased international trade.
sentences.cn: 全球化是描述增长的国际贸易专业术语。

sentences.en: Globalization is the erasure of national borders for economic purposes.
sentences.cn: 全球化是为了经济发展对国界的消除。
